org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spree_taxons INNER JOIN spree_products_taxons ON spree_taxons.id = spree_products_taxons.taxon_id WHERE spree_products_taxons.product_id = "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spree_taxons INNER JOIN spree_products_taxons ON spree_taxons.id = spree_products_taxons.taxon_id WHERE spree_products_taxons.product_id = "$1" LIMIT 1
